> #### Data Visulization 

***

**The features of data are introduced in "References" Section.**
+ [Source](https://www.kaggle.com/yannisp/uber-pickups-enriched) 
+ Features are divided into 3 categories, borough, weather and time. 
+ Feel free to check the trend of these features with the number of pickups.

***


> #### Prediction about Uber Pickups In One Week

***

**The prediction methods include Generalized Linear Model (GLM) and Autoregressive Integrated Moving Average model (ARIMA).** 
+ For **GLM**, feel free to add different features to train the model. 
+ For **ARIMA**, feel free to change these six parameter d,p,q,D,P,Q to check the predicted results. 

**Train data: from 01/01/2015 to 06/23/2015, Test data: 06/24/2015 to 06/30/2015 **
